00023 #include <cppunit.h>
00024 #ifdef cppunit_
00025 #include <DoubleVect.h>
00026 #include <TriouError.h>
00027 #include <Matrice_Dense.h>
00028 #include <SFichier.h>
00029 
00030 class MatriceDenseTest: public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture
00031 {
00032   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( MatriceDenseTest );
00033   CPPUNIT_TEST( run_rectangle_matrix_read_from_file_test );
00034   CPPUNIT_TEST( run_square_matrix_built_from_coefficients );
00035   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00036 
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00040   Matrice_Dense dense_matrix_;
00041   Matrice_Morse morse_matrix_;
00042   double threshold_ ;
00043 
00044   void setUp()
00045   {
00046 // init2();
00047   };
00048   MatriceDenseTest():CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture::TestFixture()
00049   {
00050     threshold_ = 1e-13 ;
00051   };
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 // here are tested :
00056 // - the reading of a dense matrix from a file
00057 // - access ( ) function
00058 // - the ajouter_multvect_ function
00059 // - the convert_to_morse_matrix function
00060 // - the scale function
00061 // there is 2 ways to check results, one with true result and on the other hand a
00062 // comparison between dense and morse version of the same matrix (results muste be the same)
00063 // there is a parameter threshold that can be adjust
00064   void run_rectangle_matrix_read_from_file_test( )
00065   {
00066 
00067     SFichier file ( "rectangle_dense_matrix.txt" );
00068     file << " 3 4 "<<finl;
00069     file << " 1    2  3.5   10   "<<finl;
00070     file << " 4.2  5  6     11.6 "<<finl;
00071     file << " 7.9  8  9.4  -12  "<<finl;
00072 
00073     dense_matrix_.read_from_file( "rectangle_dense_matrix.txt" );
00074     dense_matrix_.convert_to_morse_matrix( morse_matrix_ );
00075 
00076     int nb_cols = dense_matrix_.nb_colonnes( );
00077     int nb_lines = dense_matrix_.nb_lignes( );
00078     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("function nb_colonnes is broken ",nb_cols, 4 );
00079     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("function nb_lignes is broken ",nb_lines, 3 );
00080 
00081 // check access functions
00082     double coeff_35 = dense_matrix_( 0 , 2 );
00083     double diff = dabs( coeff_35 - 3.5 );
00084     int ok = ( diff < 1e-14 );
00085     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("access function ( ) is broken ",ok, 1 );
00086 
00087 
00088 // check the ajouter_multvect_ function
00089 
00090     DoubleVect vector( nb_cols );
00091     for(int i=0; i<nb_cols; i++)
00092       {
00093         vector( i ) = i+1 ;
00094       }
00095 
00096     DoubleVect result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( nb_lines );
00097     DoubleVect result_obtained_with_morse_matrix( nb_lines );
00098     result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( 0 ) = 1;
00099     result_obtained_with_morse_matrix( 0 ) = 1;
00100     result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( 1 ) = 1;
00101     result_obtained_with_morse_matrix( 1 ) = 1;
00102     result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( 2 ) = 2;
00103     result_obtained_with_morse_matrix( 2 ) = 2;
00104 
00105     dense_matrix_.ajouter_multvect_( vector , result_obtained_with_dense_matrix );
00106     morse_matrix_.ajouter_multvect_( vector , result_obtained_with_morse_matrix );
00107 
00108     DoubleVect true_result( nb_lines );
00109     true_result( 0 ) = 56.5 ;
00110     true_result( 1 ) = 79.6 ;
00111     true_result( 2 ) = 6.1  ;
00112 
00113     DoubleVect error_dense_vs_morse( nb_lines );
00114     DoubleVect error( nb_lines );
00115     for(int i=0 ; i<nb_lines; i++)
00116       {
00117         error_dense_vs_morse( i ) = dabs( result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( i ) - result_obtained_with_morse_matrix( i )  );
00118         error( i ) = dabs( result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( i ) - true_result( i ) );
00119       }
00120 
00121     double norm_error_dense_vs_morse = error_dense_vs_morse.mp_norme_vect( );
00122     double norm_error = error.mp_norme_vect( );
00123     int error_is_ok = ( norm_error < threshold_ );
00124     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("The function ajouter_multvect_ is broken ",1,error_is_ok);
00125     error_is_ok = ( norm_error_dense_vs_morse < threshold_ );
00126     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("There is a difference between results obtained using morse and dence matrices -- ajouter_multvect_ function -- ",1,error_is_ok);
00127 
00128 
00129 // now test the scale function
00130     dense_matrix_.scale( 0.5 );
00131     result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( 0 ) = 1;
00132     result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( 1 ) = 1;
00133     result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( 2 ) = 2;
00134     dense_matrix_.ajouter_multvect_( vector , result_obtained_with_dense_matrix );
00135     true_result( 0 ) =  28.7500 ;
00136     true_result( 1 ) =  40.3000 ;
00137     true_result( 2 ) =  4.0500  ;
00138     for(int i=0 ; i<nb_lines; i++)
00139       {
00140         error( i ) = dabs( result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( i ) - true_result( i ) );
00141       }
00142 
00143     norm_error = error.mp_norme_vect( );
00144 
00145     error_is_ok = ( norm_error < threshold_ );
00146     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("The function scale is broken ",1,error_is_ok);
00147 
00148 
00149   }
00150 
00151 
00152 // here we give the coefficients by hand
00153 // then we test :
00154 // - the build_matrix_from_coefficients_line_by_line function
00155 // - the ajouter_multvect_ function
00156 // - the matrix_from_coefficients_column_by_column function
00157 // - the build_the_transposed function
00158 // - the is_the_same function
00159   void run_square_matrix_built_from_coefficients( )
00160   {
00161 
00162     int nb_lines = 3;
00163     int nb_cols = 3;
00164     int nnz = 9;
00165     DoubleVect coeffs( nnz );
00166 // coeffs = 1 , 2 , ... , 9
00167     for(int i=0; i<nnz; i++)
00168       {
00169         coeffs( i ) = i+1;
00170       }
00171 
00172 // check build_matrix_from_coefficients_line_by_line function
00173     dense_matrix_.dimensionner( nb_lines , nb_cols );
00174     dense_matrix_.build_matrix_from_coefficients_line_by_line ( coeffs );
00175 
00176     DoubleVect vector( nb_cols );
00177     for(int i=0; i<nb_cols; i++)
00178       {
00179         vector( i ) = i+1 ;
00180       }
00181 
00182     DoubleVect result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( nb_lines );
00183     dense_matrix_.ajouter_multvect_( vector , result_obtained_with_dense_matrix );
00184 
00185     DoubleVect true_result( nb_lines );
00186     true_result( 0 ) = 14 ;
00187     true_result( 1 ) = 32 ;
00188     true_result( 2 ) = 50 ;
00189     DoubleVect error( nb_lines );
00190     for(int i=0 ; i<nb_lines; i++)
00191       {
00192         error( i ) = dabs( result_obtained_with_dense_matrix( i ) - true_result( i ) );
00193       }
00194 
00195     double norm_error = error.mp_norme_vect( );
00196 
00197     int error_is_ok = ( norm_error < threshold_   );
00198     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("The function build_matrix_from_coefficients_line_by_line is broken ",1,error_is_ok);
00199 
00200 // check is_the_same
00201     SFichier file1 ( "matrix1.txt" );
00202     file1 << " 3 3 "<<finl;
00203     file1 << " 1 2 3 "<<finl;
00204     file1 << " 0 5 9 "<<finl;
00205     file1 << " 8 9 2 "<<finl;
00206     SFichier file2 ( "matrix2.txt" );
00207     file2 << " 3 3 "<<finl;
00208     file2 << " 1 2 3.01 "<<finl;
00209     file2 << " 0 5 9 "<<finl;
00210     file2 << " 8 9 2 "<<finl;
00211     SFichier file3 ( "matrix3.txt" );
00212     file3 << " 3 3 "<<finl;
00213     file3 << " 1 2 3 "<<finl;
00214     file3 << " 0 5 9 "<<finl;
00215     file3 << " 8 9 2 "<<finl;
00216     Matrice_Dense matrix1,matrix2,matrix3;
00217     matrix1.read_from_file( "matrix1.txt" );
00218     matrix2.read_from_file( "matrix2.txt" );
00219     matrix3.read_from_file( "matrix3.txt" );
00220     int is_the_same = matrix1.is_the_same( matrix2 );
00221     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("matrix1 is different from matrix2 ! so is_the_same function is broken ",0,is_the_same);
00222     is_the_same = matrix1.is_the_same( matrix3 );
00223     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("matrix1 and matrix3 are the same ! so is_the_same function is broken ",1,is_the_same);
00224 
00225 // check build_matrix_from_coefficients_column_by_column and build_the_transposed
00226     Matrice_Dense transposed_matrix;
00227     dense_matrix_.build_the_transposed( transposed_matrix );
00228     dense_matrix_.build_matrix_from_coefficients_column_by_column ( coeffs );
00229 
00230     is_the_same = dense_matrix_.is_the_same( transposed_matrix );
00231     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("The function build_matrix_from_coefficients_column_by_column or build_the_transposed is broken ",1,is_the_same);
00232 
00233   }
00234 
00235 };

00237 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( MatriceDenseTest );
